review: Doctor is very polite and good with consulting. This is the second time that I'm visiting him, totally recommended.

He is our family doctor for many years *** ** **** ************* 
He is very patient and listens to all of your problems and gives you right medicines 
And he will not charge you much and also gives you concessions 
And will not give you unnecessary tests 
And always available during emergency times 
Very much recommend doctor 
He also has a clinic in Kalyan Nagar - SAMITH CLINIC 
Thank you sir

Doctor was friendly but dismissive of anything being shared. He was not interested in looking into the history of occurrences, condition, tests and prescriptions. I had to keep showing it so he would look. He started writing out the prescription and did not even care to explain what anything was for till I asked. ************* ********** *********** ******* **** ******* **** * *** ** (I had just completed a dose of antibiotics). I did not follow the prescription and went elsewhere instead. Will not recommend this approach to anyone.

Not  listened the problem properly and started  writing prescriptions ******* ******* **** ******** Spent exactly 5 to 10 minutes.  Disappointed.  It is may be due to that he is consulting in Specialist, Motherhood and other clinics.   *** **** ****** ** ******* ** ********** ******* ******* ********* **** ******* ** *** ***********
We professional as well as friendly doctor he listened to the issue patiently and his diagnosis is fantastic
